text:
((18+ ONLY))

Okay, so I need someone to indulge me in a few of my rarer kinks. These kinks are bitchsuits, cock milking, and mummification. If you could indulge me in at least one of those kinks as a Matsu in a noncon RP, I'd love that a lot!

I have a few ideas for scenarios and pairings as well. They are:

1. Oso/Choro: Oso gets fed up with Choro acting all high and mighty, so he ties him up, gags him, and humiliates him.

2. Any/OCs: One or more Matsus get kidnapped and taken to a cock milking farm.

3. Any/OCs: One or more Matsus get kidnapped and put into a petplay slave training program (bitchsuits required)

4. Totty/OCs: Todomatsu gets invited to a mixer by a cute girl, but soon discovers it's a trap when he's trussed up, gagged, and taken to a strange place.

5. Any/OC - That's Gakuen Musical AU - Matsu gets kidnapped by bullies and humiliated

6. Any/Akumatsu - Akumatsu materializes in a new body and has his way with one of his "brothers"

7. Oso/OC - Oso gets caught cheating at a casino and gets interrogated. After admitting to it, he basically becomes the casino's whore for paying customers.

If you have any other ideas, feel free to share!

My kinks include heavy bondage, shibari, struggling/thrashing, gags (!!!), bitchsuits (!!), suspension bondage, nipple clamps, begging, toys, double/triple penetration, humiliation, degradation, crying, recording, blindfolds, latex, public use, spanking, mummification bondage, orgasm denial, fucking machines, overstimulation, drool/saliva, electricity, cock milking, breathplay, and likely more! Hard no's are are anything unsanitary, gore, vore, pregnancy, bestiality, or death.

I await your connection!
Honestly I’m still technically on vacation and don’t have work so I have a lot of time on my hands to think about things. What if we had another thing going where the sextuplets are all females?
(( that could be interesting, what did you have in mind?

Then their contract changes hands and they end up switching from concerts to porn. Forced into a hiatus for streamed training before they take the stage again - or left in stalls during other idol performances. That or they’re still an idol group but they’re kidnapped and kept by a singular person that wants to keep them as fucktoys.

Great! Hmm...guess I need to figure out what kind of idol each Matsu is and then we can figure out special ways to torment them

Kara - The ice queen. She can come across as indifferent but fans seem to be okay with that.

Choro - Cute nerd. Known for being very smart.

Ichi - Obviously cats. 

Jyushi - The most excitable and known for interacting with fans that she even meets on the streets.

Totty - The very cute one.
